import { useState } from "react" const Form = () => { const [userInput,setUserInput] = useState({}) const [value, setValue] = useState('') const [value2, setValue2] = useState('') c const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log(value, value2) } return (
setValue(e.target.value)} /> setValue2(e.target.value)} />
) } export default Form
